meta.description: Haus Toys manufacturing and profit maximization problem

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit from selling each type of toy

params.name: wood_req
params.description: Wood required to manufacture each type of toy

params.name: steel_req
params.description: Steel required to manufacture each type of toy

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of toy to manufacture

vars.name: y
vars.description: y[t] = 1 if toy type t is manufactured, 0 otherwise

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[t] * x[t] for t in TOYS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from manufacturing toys

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(wood_req[t] * x[t] for t in TOYS)
constraints.description: Total wood usage cannot exceed available wood

constraints.name: steel_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(steel_req[t] * x[t] for t in TOYS)
constraints.description: Total steel usage cannot exceed available steel

constraints.name: truck_train_exclusion
constraints.description: If trucks are manufactured, trains cannot be manufactured

constraints.name: boat_plane_dependency
constraints.description: If boats are manufactured, planes must also be manufactured

constraints.name: boat_train_limit
constraints.description: Number of boats manufactured cannot exceed number of trains manufactured

constraints.name: link_x_y_truck
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for trucks

constraints.name: link_x_y_plane
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for planes

constraints.name: link_x_y_boat
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for boats

constraints.name: link_x_y_train
constraints.description: Link binary and integer variables for trains
